code_value: Questions 1~2  Your family want to visit Beijing this summer. Ask your friend there two questions about Beijing.</br>Questions 3~4  You are going to buy a new watch as a birthday gift for your best friend. Ask the shop assistant two questions about the watch you’re looking at.
